Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: XU DANYI
Reviews.Content: We are very satisfied with the performance, style, weight and durability with the thinkpad. It runs very fast and is a good partner of my jobs!

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor: Intel® CoreTM i5-3230M Processor (3M Cache, 2.6GHz - 3.2 GHz) 35W
RAM: 8 GB (2 x 4GB) DDR3 1600MHz | Hard Drive: 500GB 7200rpm HDD
Optical Disc Drive: SuperMulti 8X DVD+/-R/RW Dual Layer | Operating System: Windows 7 Professional x64 with free media Windows 8 Pro upgrade
If the computer has modifications (listed below), then the manufacturer box is opened for it to be tested and inspected and to install the upgrades to achieve the specifications as advertised. If no modifications are listed, the item is unopened and untested. Defects & blemishes are significantly reduced by our in depth inspection & testing.
The following components are upgraded: RAM
